response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its value and potential impact on your endeavors, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $14,000. This represents a substantial saving compared to its market value of $15,000, and I am confident it will provide you with a competitive edge. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information to make your decision.", "product_price": 14000}
